ReportBody.summary: The ReportBody interface of the represents the body of a report. Individual report types inherit from this interface, adding specific attributes relevant to the particular report.

remarks.para: The following interfaces inherit from ReportBody:
An instance of ReportBody is returned as the value of . The interface has no constructor.

ReportBodyToJSON.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The toJSON() method of the interface is a serializer, and returns a JSON representation of the ReportBody object.
ReportBodyToJSON.returns: A JSON object that is the serialization of the object.
